user_request: Empty the shopping cart on newegg.com. Add logitech g pro to the cart on newegg.com, then select checkout.
screen_desc: The screenshot displays the sign-in page for Newegg, an online retail platform. It prompts users to enter their email address to sign in, with a prominent "SIGN IN" button below. Alternatives for signing in include using a one-time code or logging in with Google. There's also an option to create a new account or continue as a guest for checkout. The design is simple and centered around user authentication.
